price: Say, “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only a clear warner.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
